home_badge: 153 quoc gia · 5 nganh cong nghiep · Mang luoi toan cau
home_desc: CROWNY tich hop quan ly kinh doanh cua 153 quoc gia tren mot nen tang duy nhat, ho tro su phat trien cua 5 nganh cong nghiep chinh: Tai chinh, Cong nghe sinh hoc, Nang luong, Hang hoa va Cuu tro.
home_targetValuePerEnt: Gia tri muc tieu moi doanh nghiep
home_targetEntCount: So luong doanh nghiep muc tieu
home_industriesDesc: Huong toi tang truong ben vung trong tung linh vuc nganh
home_indFinanceDesc: Doi moi tai chinh ky thuat so
home_indBioDesc: Nghien cuu va phat trien cong nghe sinh hoc
home_indGoodsDesc: Phan phoi va logistics thong minh
home_indAidDesc: Cuu tro va giao duc quoc te
home_coinDesc: Dong tien co so cua mang luoi CROWNY
home_avgGrowth: Muc tieu tang truong gia tri trung binh
home_polygonDesc: Van hanh tren mang luoi Polygon voi toc do nhanh va chi phi giao dich thap
home_walletDesc: Luu tru CROWNA an toan va su dung trong kinh doanh thong qua vi chuyen dung
home_valueDesc: CROWNY truc tiep quan ly luong nam giu va luu hanh ma khong dot coin, duy tri gia tri on dinh
home_coinNote: Bat dau voi van hanh tap trung · Chuyen dung cho kinh doanh mang luoi CROWNY · Kich hoat noi bo cho den khi dat tu 25.500 won den 153.000 won
home_ctaTitle: Chung toi dang tim kiem doi tac cung phat trien
home_ctaDesc: Nha dau tu, doanh nhan, chuyen gia - hay bat dau voi CROWNY
about_heroDesc: He sinh thai kinh doanh toan cau ket noi 153 quoc gia
about_missionTitle:
Ket noi kinh doanh toan cau
de hien thuc hoa su thinh vuong chung
about_missionDesc: CROWNY tap hop nang luc cong nghiep cua moi quoc gia, xay dung mang luoi kinh doanh xuyen bien gioi, cung cap nen tang de tat ca cac ben tham gia cung phat trien.
about_visionTitle:
Ket noi hoan toan
153 quoc gia vao nam 2030
about_visionDesc: Tam nhin cua chung toi la phat trien 153 doanh nghiep tai moi quoc gia trong 5 nganh cong nghiep chinh: Tai chinh, Cong nghe sinh hoc, Nang luong, Hang hoa va Cuu tro, tao ra gia tri 153 ty won cho moi doanh nghiep.
about_coreValuesDesc: Moi quyet dinh cua CROWNY deu dua tren nhung gia tri nay
about_transparencyDesc: Cong khai minh bach moi dong von va tinh hinh kinh doanh theo thoi gian thuc.
about_sustainabilityDesc: Theo duoi viec tao ra gia tri dai han va tac dong xa hoi thay vi loi nhuan ngan han.
about_globalCoopDesc: Toi da hoa suc manh tong hop bang cach ket hop the manh cua cac quoc gia vuot qua bien gioi.
about_tokenEconomyDesc: He thong kinh te noi bo dua tren dong CROWNA
about_coinFeature1: Phat hanh tong cong {amount} dong, dua tren mang luoi Polygon
about_coinFeature2: Bat dau voi van hanh tap trung, cung cap vi CROWNY chuyen dung
about_coinFeature3: Phuong thuc thanh toan chuyen dung cho kinh doanh mang luoi CROWNY
about_coinFeature4: Quan ly gia tri thong qua nam giu va luu hanh ma khong dot coin
about_priceNote: Muc tieu tang gia tri trung binh tren 7% · Kich hoat dich vu noi bo cho den khi dat 153.000 won
about_roadmapDesc: Mo rong mang luoi toan cau theo tung giai doan
about_phase1Desc: Xac minh nen tang voi 1 quoc gia (Han Quoc) va 5 doanh nghiep
about_phase2Desc: Mo rong den 5 quoc gia chau A bao gom Nhat Ban, Viet Nam
about_phase3Desc: Tien vao cac quoc gia chinh o chau Au va Bac My, nang cap he thong dau tu
about_phase4Desc: Dat 100 quoc gia bao gom chau Phi va Nam My
about_phase5Desc: Hoan thanh mang luoi 153 quoc gia tren toan the gioi va xay dung he thong van hanh tu chu
about_orgDesc: Van hanh toan cau hieu qua voi he thong 7 cap do vai tro
about_orgL0Desc: Quan ly tong the nen tang
about_orgL1Desc: Quan ly kinh doanh tai quoc gia tuong ung
about_orgL2Desc: Hoach dinh chien luoc theo nganh
about_orgL4Desc: Thuc hien kinh doanh thuc te
about_orgL5Desc: Khai thac thi truong va ban hang
about_orgL6Desc: Dau tu von va tham gia tang truong

about_ctaDesc: Chung toi dang tao ra tieu chuan moi cho kinh doanh toan cau

tv_matthewNote: Duy tri hinh anh chuyen nghiep · Noi dung outlier · Muc do hap dan tang sau 7 tap

tv_benefit1Title: Tang gia tri tai san thuong hieu
tv_benefit1Desc: Vuot ra ngoai kenh thong thuong, tro thanh mot 'nha truyen thong'

tv_benefit2Desc: Doanh thu ket hop tu san xuat (InterM), lam dep (CROWNY), noi dung (YouTube) va tai chinh
